title: Nadhim Zahawi – 2022 Comments on the PE and Sport Premium
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nadhim Zahawi, the Secretary of State for Education, on 25 June 2022.
content:
I want every child to have the opportunity to develop a love of music and sport, so they can explore their passions and fulfil their potential.
